response.overview: After an accident leaves her with amnesia, Skye Reed tries to use her social media account to rediscover who she is. But when the online version of her life doesn’t reflect her reality, her world begins to crumble as she realises she doesn’t like the person she truly is.
response.tagline: A woman suffering from amnesia uses her social media account to rediscover who she is.
response.title: Curated Illusions
